topics.learning_outcomes: Describe digestion. Identify the organs of the digestive system. Identify parts of the alimentary canal where digested food is absorbed. Explain what happens to undigested food.

subtopics: Effect of viruses and bacteria on health
topics.learning_outcomes: Distinguish between a virus and a bacterium. Explain how viruses and bacteria can affect health. Identify common diseases of the skin. Explain the prevalence of diseases in relation to the provision of health services.

subtopics: Importance of fruits and seeds for health
topics.learning_outcomes: Identify fruits used as food. Identify seeds used as food. State the importance of fruits in improving health.
Demonstrate the separation of an insoluble solid from water. Demonstrate the separation of a soluble substance from water. Demonstrate the separation of iron fillings from sand.
Identify sources of water in the village and towns. Identify different types of water treatment systems. State the importance of water treatment. Describe ways of conserving water.
Identify the parts of a flower. Explain the functions of the parts of the flower.
Describe pollination. Identify the agents of pollination. Describe fertilization in flowering plants.
Explain why plants produce seeds. Explain the importance of improving seed varieties.
Describe what seed dispersal is. Describe ways in which seeds are dispersed. Explain the importance of seed dispersal.
Explain what plant propagation is. State methods of plant propagation. Demonstrate how some plants are propagated in the local area.
Explain what energy is. Identify different types of energy. Explain how energy is converted from one form into another.

subtopics: Definition and uses of electric current
topics.learning_outcomes: Explain what an electric current does. Demonstrate how to construct a simple electric circuit. Distinguish between a series and parallel circuit. Describe the action of a switch in a circuit.
Identify the causes of lightning. Explain the effects of lightning on plants, animals and buildings. Demonstrate how to prevent damage from lightning. State the importance of lightning in farming.

subtopics: Source of light in solar system
topics.learning_outcomes: Describe the solar system. Explain the differences between the sun and its planets. State the source of light in the solar system. State the reasons for seasons and day and night. Compare the movement of the earth and the moon. Describe the formation of solar and lunar eclipses. State uses of solar energy.
Identify types of metals and non-metals. Describe conduction and non-conduction of electricity.

Identify minerals mined in Zambia. List the properties of copper. Explain how copper is extracted and refined. Identify items made from copper within Zambia. Explain the importance of making copper items within Zambia. Describe the impact of mining on the environment.
